# Zinfandel
## Rundown
- Big 4
    - Full Bodied
    - High Fruit
        - Exotic array of fruits from stone fruits to red fruits to blue fruits to black fruits, with a bit of tobacco
    - Medium Tannin
    - Medium-Low Acidity
- Subgroups

## Dukes Wines and Distinctions
- **Bedrock “Old Vine”** 🍾
    - Sonoma California
    - Beautifully perfumed,  dark fruits with peppers and spice
